local.description: Set up local connection to the Quatt heatpump.

add_remote.description: Add remote connectivity through the Quatt mobile API to retrieve additional heatpump data.

remote.description:
Set up remote connection to the Quatt heatpump via the mobile API.
Enter the CIC ID (e.g., CIC-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx).

pair.title: Pair with the Quatt device
pair.description:
Please enter your name and press the button on the CIC device ({cic}).

![Pairing button location](/quatt_static/pair.png)

Complete pairing within 60 seconds.

Press 'Submit' to start the pairing process and wait for confirmation.

error.invalid_cic: Invalid CIC format. Must start with 'CIC-'
error.pairing_timeout: Pairing timeout. Please try again and press the button on the CIC device within 60 seconds.

abort.already_in_progress: A configuration flow for this Quatt device is already in progress.

data_description.scan_interval: Number of seconds between requesting information from the Quatt.
data_description.remote_scan_interval: Number of minutes between requesting information from the mobile Quatt API.
data_description.power_sensor: External energy sensor that measures the current energy consumption of the Quatt.
